Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a financial transaction, either income or expense.

description.description: A descriptive title for the transaction.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction. Positive for income, negative for expense.

category.description: The category to which the transaction belongs (e.g., 'Food', 'Salary').

installmentId.description: Identifier for grouping transactions related to the same installment purchase. Null if not an installment.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the transaction was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the transaction was last updated.

CreditCard.title: CreditCard
CreditCard.description: Represents a credit card with its associated details.

name.description: The name of the credit card (e.g., 'Visa', 'Mastercard').

totalLimit.description: The credit limit of the card.

closingDay.description: The closing day of the card's billing cycle.

dueDay.description: The due day of the card's bill payment.

UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents user-specific preferences and settings related to AI finance personalities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, matching the auth UID.

aiPersonality.description: The selected AI finance personality for the user.

aiKnowledgeLevel.description: The selected AI knowledge level for the user.

definition.description: Stores financial transaction data for a specific user.
Stores credit card details for a specific user.
Stores user profile data including AI personality preferences.
